appName: Glider Sim Deluxe – Soaring / Flight Simulator (Powered By Google Earth)
displayName: Glider Sim Deluxe – Soaring / Flight Simulator (Powered By Google Earth)
display_name: Glider Sim Deluxe – Soaring / Flight Simulator (Powered By Google Earth)
display_long_description:
**SOAR THROUGH REALISTIC SKIES:**   
Experience the thrill of free flight in VR with authentic physics, stunning scenery, and endless exploration.

**FLY ANYWHERE ON EARTH:**  
 Explore the entire planet with Google Earth integration—no more subscription required! Discover photorealistic landscapes, save favorite locations, and share them with friends in multiplayer.

**MASTER 8 UNIQUE AIRCRAFT**  
Paraglider, Paramotor, Hang Glider, Mini-Wing, Speedwing, Ultralight Trike, FPV Racing Drone, and Spectator Cam. Each offers distinct flight characteristics.

**3 CUSOTM OFFLINE MAPS**

- Sun Valley, USA
- Walenstadt, Switzerland (Swiss Alps)
- Grand Teton, USA

Each map spans 50+ square kilometers of enhanced real-world terrain with high-resolution textures and hundreds of launch points. Playable with no internet connection. 

**DYNAMIC WEATHER & THERMALS:**  
Control wind speed, direction, cloud base, and time of day. Sun angle and terrain generate realistic thermal activity. Toggle wind particles to visualize thermals and ridge lift.

**AUTHENTIC FLIGHT PHYSICS:**  
Advanced soft-body simulation models each wing cell, enabling realistic wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops.

**COMPETE & CONNECT:**  
Master Speed Flying challenges and Cross Country races. Climb monthly leaderboards, fly with friends in multiplayer, or join the Discord community to organize group flights.
Your next flight awaits.
